::Prowl/Reptilica::

Reptilica walks into the bridge. He had been wandering the ship and had found 
nothing unordinary so far. He was bored.

Reptilica sits down at a chair, looking down at the internal scanners with 
bored optics. He frowns as his eyes go over the readings from the Tortrue 
chambers. Two Maximals....... One of them was one of the hostages, the other 
one was clearly a different bot.

"Computer, activate visual of torture chambers."

A security camera activates in the torture chambers, displaying what it 
records on the screen. Reptilica's eyes widen. On the floor, laying beside a 
mean looking Maximal was Dark One, in a puddle of his own mech fluid, with 
Nemesis laying not too far away, mechfluid dripping from his head. He frowns. 
That one bot could not have taken out both Dark One and Nemesis, and where 
was the other hostage?

"Computer, scan for cloaking," he orders, the computer obeying. He frowns at 
the results. Two more bots were cloaked.....

"Red alert! Four Maximal intruders in the torture chambers!" Reptilica yells 
into his comm-link, running out of the bridge with his gun ready as the 
klaxxon lights as sirens activate.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl's head jerks up from Iron Raptor's face as he hears the alarms. He 
swears silently, wondering how the Alliance could have detected them. Looking 
over at Dinobot and Tavatron he groans. They wern't cloaked, that's how.

"Donobot, Tavatron, cloak and lets get out of here!" he yells in Dinobot's 
direction. Looking back up at the vent. They didn't have enough time to go 
through that way...

Reluctantly, he takes his arms off of Iron Raptor, walking over to Nemesis 
Enforcer. He lifts the unconscious bot, dragging him over to the doors. As 
Prowl puts Nemesis' hand up to a screen on the side of the door, both the 
blast doors and the door open.

Prowl turns around to look at the rest of the group. "Let's go before they 
all file in here!"
